Your login will only be used to log you into your account. You can change your displayed name later. Your e-mail address will only be used if you forget your password. You are only changing your displayed username. Your login will stay the same. Your e-mail address will only be used if you forget your password. Something went wrong - please try again later This e-mail address isn't associated with any account Genres Close Published stories: Published comments: Comments published under your stories: Stories added to favourites: Your stories have been added to favourites: Your stories have been rated: Average story length in words: Sum of words in published stories: Stories published per genre: Best streak: Minigame score: — SavedQueries com.zpi.SharedPrefs Add comment Comment Add delete Genre: %s Prompt: %s Written by: %s Average score: %s/5.0 Be the first person to rate this story! Nobody has rated this story yet AI ANALYSIS ORIGINAL STORY AI GENERATED STORY AI generation in progress. Results will be available soon. AI analysis in progress. Results will be available soon. Not yet available. Genre of text: Compatibility with generated genre: Prompt completion: Correctness: Vocabulary variety: Positiveness: Negativeness: Neutralness: AI analysis: explained Genre - this is the genre that has been artificially assigned to this story. It does not have to match the genre in the prompt.
Compatibility with generated genre - this value informs you how well this story fits the genre in the challenge.
Prompt completion - this value informs you how many words in the prompts are in this story. Words in the prompt don't have to be used exactly - for example, verbs can be conjugated.
Correctness - this is the number of words with spelling mistakes in relation to all the words in this story.
Vocabulary variety - this value informs you how many different words have been used in this story.
Positiveness, negativeness and neutralness inform you what the general feeling of this story is - if it is a happy, sad or neutral story.

In general, the higher the values, the better :) 1074516094425-oq21c65ivebqq2bqf1htplnq9ukeq4qj.apps.googleusercontent.com 1074516094425-bc8pg37o0t1dve948n9dkdbin25c2f77.apps.googleusercontent.com Go back Hide Show Show info Exit minigame Next pair in this genre This story was generated using two AI models - CBART and GPT-Neo No pairs available in this genre. Choose another genre or try again later. Choose which story in this pair scored higher first! Which story do you think scored higher in the AI analysis module? Draw! Both stories got %.2f points in total in the AI analysis module.

The goal of the game is to guess which story scored higher in the AI analysis module. You get a point for each correct guess.

Filter Delete Favourite Unfavourite Action button About wr(a)ite Help Use the "Log out" button in the "Profile" tab to log out We are a team of young programmers studying Applied Computer Science at Wrocław University of Technology. This app was born out of our mutual interest in mobile applications, artificial intelligence and writing. We created this app in our 7th semester — the last semester of our engineering degree. wr(a)ite was created in 2022 as part of our Team Engineering Project course. The official title of the project is "Mobile application for the development of writing skills using artificial intelligence for text creation and analysis". Our team: — Agnieszka Kłobus — Aleksandra Koperwas — Aleksandra Stecka — Bogusława Tlołka Thank you for using wr(a)ite! Previous Next %s day %s days %s time %s times How to use? Welcome to wr(a)ite — the app to help you develop your writing skills.

Did you know?
The name wr(a)ite is a combination of the words "write" and "AI". We know it's cheesy :)

Before you begin let us show you how to use our app. Your stories Use the "Your stories" tab to see your stories.

You can use the searchbar at the top of the screen to search for keywords in your stories.

Press a story to open it's details - you'll be able to see it's average score and other people's comments, as well as delete the story. To delete the story press the "Delete" button.

To add a new story press the floating plus button in the bottom right corner of the screen and choose the number of words you want — a challenge with a genre and 1, 3 or 5 words will be generated. Community Use the "Community" tab to see stories written by other users.

You can use the searchbar at the top of the screen to search for keywords in their stories. You can use the "Filter" button to filter stories by genre. The selected genres will be darker when using the light theme and lighter when using the dark theme.

Press a story to open it's details - you'll be able to see it's average score and other people's comments, as well as rate the story, add or delete it from your favourites and publish or delete a comment.

Use the "Favourite" button to add the story to your favourites and the "Unfavourite" button to remove it from your favourites.

Use the rating bar to rate the story.

Use the "Add comment" button to write a comment. To delete your comment press the "Delete" button on the comment. Play Use the "Play" tab to play a fun minigame.

A pair of stories will be presented to you - they will both have the same genre and prompt, but one will have been written by another user and the other will have been artificially generated.

The goal of the game is to guess which story scored higher in the AI analysis module. You get a point for each correct guess.

Good luck! Profile Use the "Profile" tab to see your favourites and statistics or to edit your account data.

Your favourites are a list of stories on which you've pressed the "Favourite" button.

Your statistics are statistics of your usage of wr(a)ite.

In the "Profile" tab you can also change your account information - profile picture, name, password and e-mail address. Remember that your name and login are not the same thing.

You can also display information about the app after pressing the "About wr(a)ite" button or display this tutorial again after pressing the "Help" button.

Press the "Log out" button to log out and protect your data. Help If you ever need help while using the app, go to the "Profile" tab and press "Help". This tutorial will be displayed again.

Happy writing! zpi.aaab.noreply@gmail.com cruyhftjigdsmrzh wr(a)ite - reset password request Hello!

You've recently sent a request to generate a new password for your wr(a)ite account.
If this wasn't you - ignore this message. Someone must have accidentally written your login instead of theirs when requesting to generate a new password. Don't worry, your password has not been reset yet.
You can change your password after you've logged into your account.

To generate a new, random password click this link: https://zpi-aaab.herokuapp.com/resetPassword/%s

Happy writing! - the wr(a)ite team



Please do not respond to this message. wr(a)ite - remind login request Hello!

You've recently sent a request to remind you your login.
If this wasn't you - ignore this message. Someone must have accidentally written your e-mail address instead of theirs when requesting to remind them their login.

\The logins associated with your e-mail address are: %s

Happy writing! - the wr(a)ite team



Please do not respond to this message. No stories have been published yet. Please check again later. You haven't published a story yet. To add a new story press the floating plus button in the bottom right corner of the screen and choose the number of words you want — a challenge with a genre and 1, 3 or 5 words will be generated.
